title: launcher not working
body: it opens when it says launch but after nothing happens help plzzzz

replies.body:
From your description, it sounds like you can't reach the login screen from the patcher. This often happens as a result of network settings that conflict with League, so you should be able to resolve this by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know if this resolved your issues.
